alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:38PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Millard...eastern Juab...southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 638 PM MDT, automated weather sensors reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range to 24 miles west of Nephi. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Mesonet. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nephi, Dugway English Village, Rocky Ridge, Vernon, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Elberta, Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge, Mona, Goshen, Eureka, Leamington, Lynndyl, Jericho, Tintic Junction, Little Sahara State Park and Lofgreen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 217 and 241. US Route 6 between mile markers 99 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
